hero.title: Turn Vibes into Videos Instantly
hero.description: Revolutionary AI platform for creating professional videos without skills, equipment, or budget. 10x faster and cheaper.

features.section_description: Advanced features and technologies for creating stunning videos

list.title: Custom Characters with AI Memory
list.description: Your AI actor database using LoRA technology. Create and save unique characters for your videos.

list.title: Cinematic Camera Controls
list.description: Pans, zooms, bullet-time — without physical cameras. Add professional camera movements with one click.

list.title: Multi-Agent AI Workflow
list.description: A model where each agent does its job. Specialized AI for scripting, filming, editing, and sound.

list.title: Fast & Efficient
list.description: Idea → video in minutes, not hours or days. Speed up your workflow and create more content.

list.title: Cost Saving
list.description: Cinematography on a budget. Get professional video without spending on crew and equipment.

list.title: Easy Editing & Integration
list.description: Storyboard, drag-drop, export to TikTok / YouTube. Intuitive interface for quick finalization of your video.

howItWorks.section_description: Direct your video in 3 easy steps – AI agents handle the rest.

steps.title: Define Your Vision
steps.description: Describe your idea, vibe, or plot — just a few phrases are enough

steps.title: AI Generates the Scene
steps.description: Multi-agent system creates script, frames, and characters

steps.title: Refine and Finalize
steps.description: Adjust the style, export your video, and share it with the world

useCases.section_title: Made for Creators, Businesses, Musicians & Teams
useCases.section_description: Find the perfect use case for SuperDuperAI to meet your needs.

cta.title: Ready to create your next video sensation?
cta.description: Join SuperDuperAI and start creating amazing videos right now.

ctaGeneric.title: Let's Build Products That Change the World
ctaGeneric.description: We're always looking for like-minded people who want to create meaningful products together. Got an idea, a partnership, or just want to talk? Let's connect.

products.section_description: AI-powered tools for creators, businesses, and musicians.

founder.name: Rustam Salavatov
founder.bio: Founder of SuperDuperAI and creator of Life2Film (photo-to-video AI). Building AI-powered creative tools that make professional content creation accessible to everyone.
founder.philosophy: Purpose over profit. I believe the best technology is the kind that empowers ordinary people to do extraordinary things — without gatekeepers, expensive tools, or years of training.

services.section_description: Custom AI solutions for your business. From prototype to production.
services.ai_agents_desc: Design and deploy multi-agent systems for customer support, content creation, data processing, and business automation.
services.rag_desc: Build retrieval-augmented generation systems that give your AI accurate, up-to-date answers from your own data.
services.mvp_desc: Go from idea to working prototype fast. Full-stack AI product development with Next.js, Python, and cloud infrastructure.
services.training_desc: Hands-on workshops on prompt engineering, AI integration, and building with LLMs for your engineering team.

mobileApps.facealarm_description: The alarm that makes sure you're actually awake. Uses on-device face detection — stops ringing only when it sees your face.
mobileApps.jawharp_description: Virtual jaw harp synthesizer with authentic sound engine, touch controls, and effects. Play traditional instrument sounds on your iPhone.

pricing.banner_desc: New users get 100 credits completely free - enough to create multiple projects and explore almost all our features. Test the power of AI creativity with no commitment.
free_features: Access to basic editing tools only
base_features: Full access to all editing tools
Personal manager to assist with your projects
Exclusive training sessions to boost your skills
pro_features: Full access to all editing tools
Personal manager to assist with your projects
Exclusive training sessions to boost your skills

creative.title: SuperDuperAI Creative Partnership Program
creative.desc: We're looking for passionate content creators and artists! Join our program and receive 1000+ free credits, 1-on-1 support, and early access to new features. Perfect for creators with socially meaningful projects and innovative ideas.
